pages.text: The $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$() generates electricity from liquid fuel and a solid reactant. Its maximum output is 40-120 RF/t depending on the tier.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Raw materials required: 6 $(item)Lead Ingots$(), 2 $(item)Iron Ingots$(), 3 $(item)Redstone$() and a $(item)Silver Ingot$().

pages.title: Fuels
pages.text: The following reactions are supported in the $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$():$(li)$(item)Destabilized Redstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Sugar$(): 80 000 RF$(li)$(item)Destabilized Redstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Nether Wart$(): 100 000 RF$(li)$(item)Destabilized Redstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Gunpowder$(): 100 000 RF$(li)$(item)Destabilized Redstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Blaze Powder$(): 150 000 RF$(li)$(item)Destabilized Redstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Ghast Tear$(): 150 000 RF$(li)$(item)Energized Glowstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Sugar$(): 100 000 RF

$(li)$(item)Energized Glowstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Nether Wart$(): 125 000 RF$(li)$(item)Energized Glowstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Gunpowder$(): 125 000 RF$(li)$(item)Energized Glowstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Blaze Powder$(): 200 000 RF$(li)$(item)Energized Glowstone$()$(br)  + $(item)Ghast Tear$(): 200 000 RF$(li)$(item)Blazing Pyrotheum$()$(br)  + $(item)Cryotheum Dust$(): 400 000 RF$(li)$(item)Gelid Cryotheum$()$(br)  + $(item)Pyrotheum Dust$(): 400 000 RF$(li)$(item)Zephyrean Aerotheum$()$(br)  + $(item)Petrotheum Dust$(): 400 000RF$(li)$(item)Tectonic Petrotheum$()$(br)  + $(item)Aerotheum Dust$(): 400 000 RF

The speed at which energy is generated and fuel is consumed depends on how much power can be emitted, and on the dynamo's maximum power output. A basic $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$() has a maximum power output of 40 RF/t. This can be increased by upgrading the dynamo to a higher tier, and by installing certain augments.

When an active $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$() cannot emit the energy it generates, it will keep working at its minimum power output (a tenth of its maximum power output). Any more energy that is generated in this case is lost. This can be resolved by installing an $(item)Excitation Field Limiter$().

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: $(thing)Reactant Dynamos$() come in six tiers. These have the following power output limits and augment slots:$(li)Basic: 40 RF/t, no augments$(li)Hardened: 60 RF/t, 1 slot$(li)Reinforced: 80 RF/t, 2 slots$(li)Signalum: 100 RF/t, 3 slots$(li)Resonant: 120 RF/t, 4 slots

pages.title: Augments
pages.text: The following augments can be installed in a $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$() to improve it:$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/auxiliary_transmission_coil)Auxiliary Transmission Coil$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/fuel_catalyzer)Fuel Catalyzer$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/transmission_coil_ducting)Transmission Coil Ducting$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/excitation_field_limiter)Excitation Field Limiter$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/elemental_catalyzer)Elemental Catalyzer$()$(p)Note that the number of augments is limited by the dynamo's tier.
